author: ly615
body: This PR makes two updates in Validation/L1T package which is used to fill the L1TriggerVsGen histograms for L1T RelVal: remove the low pt gen objects (i.e pt < 10GeV);  fill the overflow pt entries (i.e pt >160GeV) in the last pt bin 120-160 GeV.
title: [92X] L1T Validation Module with GeneratorParticle Information: remove low pt objects and fill overflow in last bin
